Are you jealous of rich people?

Hungarian: Mit tennél, ha nyernél a lottón?

Hungarian: Mit tennél, ha nagy örökséget kapnál?

Hungarian: Elmondanád mindenkinek, ha nyernél a lottón?

Hungarian: Abbahagynád a munkát, ha nyernél a lottón?

English: Have you ever found money in the street?
Have you ever visited a casino?

Is the lottery worth it?
What do you think of betting?

Have you ever stolen money?

Finnish: Onko joku koskaan varastanut sinulta rahaa?
English: Has anyone ever stolen money from you?

English: What would you do if you saw a shoplifter in the store?
Hungarian: Mit tennél, ha látnál egy tolvajt a boltban?

How much tax do you pay on your monthly income?
